name: hypnose-stammtisch.de
description: Hypnose Stammtisch Community Calendar - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && php cli/cli.php dev serve
scripts.build:all: bun run backend:install:prod && bun run build:frontend && bun run build:bundle
scripts.format:all: bun run format:frontend && bun run format:php
scripts.format:frontend: bun run format:frontend:code && bun run format:frontend:svelte
scripts.format:php: cd backend && composer exec phpcbf -- --standard=phpcs.xml --runtime-set ignore_errors_on_exit 1 --runtime-set ignore_warnings_on_exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.setup: bun install && bun run install:backend && bun run setup:backend
scripts.backend:security:composer-audit: cd backend && composer validate --no-check-publish && composer audit || exit 0
scripts.backend:optimize: bun run backend:install:prod && cd backend && php cli/cli.php cache:clear || exit 0
scripts.deploy:package: bun run build:all && powershell -NoLogo -NonInteractive -Command "Compress-Archive -Force -Path dist,backend/api -DestinationPath build-artifact.zip"
scripts.backend:admin:list: cd backend && php cli/cli.php admin list
scripts.backend:admin:create: cd backend && php cli/cli.php admin create
scripts.backend:database:status: cd backend && php cli/cli.php database status
scripts.backend:database:backup: cd backend && php cli/cli.php database backup
scripts.backend:test: cd backend && php cli/cli.php test all
